# About Shen Lab

Shen lab is a research group in the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. We are interested in method development for multi-omics and their applications in precision medicine.

![](images/shen_lab_logo8.png)

## How to find us? 

* Shen lab website: <https://shen-lab.org>

* Shen lab GitHub: https://github.com/jaspershen-lab

* Shen lab Twitter: https://x.com/xiaotaoshen1990
